items.sentence: Tom is a dead man. He just doesn't know it yet.
Tom lacks intrinsic motivation to study French.
Tom isn't an optometrist. He's an obstetrician.
That sounds interesting. What did you tell him?
Tom drinks at least three cups of coffee a day.
No matter how sleepy you are, brush your teeth.
This is the person I spoke about the other day.
How long does it take to become a cardiologist?
I intend to spend a few hours a day doing that.
Tom went to ask the teacher about the homework.
